import { ethers } from 'ethers'; import { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import close from '../assets/close.svg'; /* var hasBought = false const buyHandler = () => { // button for new page hasBought = true } */ const Home = ({ realty, provider, account, escrow, togglePopup }) => { // set React component states const [buyer, setBuyer] = useState(null) const [lender, setLender] = useState(null) const [inspector, setInspector] = useState(null) const [seller, setSeller] = useState(null) const [hasBought, setHasBought] = useState(null) const [hasLended, setHasLended] = useState(null) const [hasInspected, setHasInspected] = useState(null) const [hasSold, setHasSold] = useState(null) const fetchDetails = async () => { // get contract details const buyer = await escrow.buyer(realty.id) // returns eth address of the buyer from escrow .js object setBuyer(buyer) const lender = await escrow.lender(realty.id) // returns eth address of the lender from escrow .js object setLender(lender) const inspector = await escrow.inspector(realty.id) // returns eth address of the inspector from escrow .js object setInspector(inspector) const seller = await escrow.seller(realty.id) // returns eth address of the seller from escrow .js object setSeller(seller) const hasBought = await escrow.approval(realty.id, buyer) // returns contract approval of the buyer from escrow .js object setHasBought(hasBought) const hasLended = await escrow.approved(realty.id) // returns contract approval of the lender from escrow .js object setHasLended(hasLended) const hasInspected = await escrow.inspectionPassed(realty.id) // returns contract approval of the inspector from escrow .js object setHasInspected(Inspected) const hasSold = await escrow.isListed(realty.id) // returns contract approval of the seller from escrow .js object setHasSold(hasSold) } return (
togglePopup(realty)}>

{realty.name}

{realty.attributes[2].value} beds | {realty.attributes[3].value} bath | {realty.attributes[4].value} sqft

{realty.address}

{realty.attributes[0].value} ETH

Facts and Features

    {realty.attributes.map((attribute, index) => (
  • {attribute.trait_type} : {attribute.value}
    • ))}
); } export default Home;
